questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve a conversion problem, the unit you're converting to is always written______.

choices.answer: on the bottom of the division line
on the top of the division line
at the beginning of the calculation

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve a conversion problem, the unit you're converting from is always written ______.

choices.answer: on the bottom of the division line
on the top of the division line
at the beginning of the calculation

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve a conversion problem, you always start by writing ________.

choices.answer: the number and unit you're converting to
a power of 10
the number and unit you're converting from

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve a conversion problem, you always end with ______.

choices.answer: the number and unit you're converting to
a power of 10
the number and unit you're converting from

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve a conversion problem, you cancel _______.

choices.answer: all units
like units on the top and bottom of the problem
units that differ from each other

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve unit conversion problems, count on the metric scale from unit to unit to ___.

choices.answer: get the final answer
eliminate units
get the power of 10

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve unit conversion problems, place the power of 10 to the left of __________ .

choices.answer: the initial unit
the smaller unit
the larger unit

questions.question: When using dimensional analysis to solve unit conversion problems, place the number "1" to the left of __________.

choices.answer: the initial unit
the smaller unit
the larger unit

questions.question: Use dimensional analysis to solve:  34.2 Km = _______ Hm
